content:
(1) also add voluntary exits and slashings into the mix. ideally formal verification as well with proper invariants, the code flow is quite tricky
(2) seems fine. the rewards are flat regardless of effective balance; instead, the effective balance is consulted when initializing next_sync_committee. so, the previous slot producer may manipulate it, but I don't see a way how. deposits only take effect on finality. and consolidations only trigger once min withdrawability delay has passed. so it _should_ be safe imo, but would like more eyes
(3) seems to be a misleading variable name. the source_effective_balance is actually the minimum of actual and effective balance, so it should be fine
(4)/(5) still open
